title: W3.CSS Cells

metadata.description: Learn about W3.CSS Cells with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. W3.CSS Cell Classes Class Description w3-cell-row Container for cells (columns). w3-cell Cell (column). w3-cell-top Aligns content at the top of a cell (column). w3-cell-middle Aligns content at the vertical middle of a cell (column). w3-cell-bottom Aligns content at the bottom of a cell (column). w3-mobile Adds mobile-first responsiveness to a cell (column). Displays elements as block elements on mobile devices. HTML Block Elements Originally, HTML block elements (like
elements) display as vertical blocks: Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Example

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

W3.CSS Cell (w3-cell) The w3-cell class redefines a block element to display horizontally (like a table cell): Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Example

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

W3.CSS Cell Container (w3-cell-row) The w3-cell-row is a container for cells (columns). The width of the w3-cell-row container defines the total width of all the contained cells. The default width is 100%: Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Example

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

If you change the width of the cell container, it will reduce the total width of the contained cells: Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Example

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Cells are Self Adjusting The w3-cell class has a very nice built-in self adjusting standard. Side-by-side elements will automatically adjust to the necessary width: Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Example

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Cells Adjust to Equal Height Side-by-side w3-cell elements will also automatically self-adjust to equal height: Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Example

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Responsive Layout The w3-mobile class adds mobile first responsiveness to any HTML element. Used together with w3-cell it will display cells vertically on small screens/mobile phones and horizontally on medium/large screens. On medium and large screens: Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. On small screens: Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Example

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Easy Alignment The w3-cell class makes it very easy to align text. There are 3 different alignment classes: w3-cell-top (default) w3-cell-middle w3-cell-bottom Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Example

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

The w3-cell-row class stretches the elements to fit the page width: Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Hello W3.CSS Cell. Example

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

Hello W3.CSS Cell.

★ +1

related_topics.title: C Common Pitfalls and How to Avoid Them

quiz.question: What is row?
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of row is 'a container for cells (columns)'.

quiz.question: What is The default width?
quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of The default width is '100%:
Hello W3'.

summary: This tutorial covers W3.CSS Cells concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use W3.CSS Cells effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of W3.CSS Cells and how to apply it in your projects.
